mapper.select: select fduPublishID,fduPublishConditionID, fduConditionID,fdiParamOrder,fdiIsMultiSelect,fdiPrerequisite, fdiGroupIndex,fdiIsCommonUse,fdcSearchKind,fdcBusinessCode, FDCTABLEALIAS, FDCFIELDALIAS, FDISTEP, FDCSTEPUNIT from TBCONDITIONDETAIL where FDUPUBLISHCONDITIONID = #{fdupublishconditionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FDUPUBLISHID = #{fdupublishid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select fduPublishID,fduPublishConditionID, fduConditionID,fdiParamOrder,fdiIsMultiSelect,fdiPrerequisite, fdiGroupIndex,fdiIsCommonUse,fdcSearchKind,fdcBusinessCode, FDCTABLEALIAS, FDCFIELDALIAS, FDISTEP, FDCSTEPUNIT from TBCONDITIONDETAIL where FDUPUBLISHCONDITIONID = #{fdupublishconditionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FDUCONDITIONID = #{fduconditionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TBCONDITIONDETAIL (fduPublishID,fduPublishConditionID, fduConditionID,fdiParamOrder,fdiIsMultiSelect,fdiPrerequisite, fdiGroupIndex,fdiIsCommonUse,fdcSearchKind,fdcBusinessCode, FDCTABLEALIAS, FDCFIELDALIAS, FDISTEP, FDCSTEPUNIT) values (#{publishID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishConditionID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isMultiSelect,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prerequisite,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isCommonUse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{searchKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{step,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stepUnit,jdbcType=CHAR})
